objects.moduledoc: Checks that the function name and params are correct for the definition and invocation
Behaviour that defines a request performer
Implements `EXRequester.Performer` behaviour. Performs an HTTP request using HTTPotion

Implements `EXRequester.Performer` behaviour. Mocks an HTTP request by sending message to self
This class is used in tests

objects.name: check_definition_params
objects.doc:
Checks that the function defined with the parameters is correctly defined for the URL and Header keys

Parameters:

* `function_name` - The function name used
* `function_params` - The function parameters used in definition
* `url` - The url used to define the function
* `header_keys` - The headers used to define the function

objects.name: check_invocation_params
objects.doc:
Checks that the function invocation with the parameters is correctly defined for the URL and Header keys

Parameters:

* `function_name` - The function name used
* `function_params` - The function parameters used in invocation
* `url` - The url used to invoke the function
* `header_keys` - The headers used to invoke the function

objects.name: check_params
objects.doc:
Checks that the url, header_keys and function parameters match

Parameters:

* `url` - The url used to invoke the function
* `header_params` - The headers used to invoke the function
* `params` - The function parameters used in invocation

objects.name: definition_param_error_report
objects.doc:
Get an error string for missing and extra params

Parameters:

* `missing` - The missing parameters in the definition
* `extra` - The extra parameters in the definition

objects.name: propsed_method_definition
objects.doc:
Get the proposed method definition

Parameters:

* `func_name` - The function name used
* `params` - The parameters used in the function

objects.name: propsed_method_invocation
objects.doc:
Get the proposed method definition

Parameters:

* `func_name` - The function name used
* `params` - The parameters used in the function

objects.name: url_params
objects.doc: Get url parametrs from a url

objects.name: check_called_correctly
objects.doc:
Check that the function was called correctly

Parameters:

* `function_name` - the function name to define
* `params` - the function parameters used
* `request` - `EXRequester.request` to use

objects.name: check_has_http_method
objects.doc: Ensure that the http method was defined

objects.name: clear_attributes
objects.doc: Clear the module attributes after defining the functions

objects.name: define_catch_error_for_empty
objects.doc:
Define a catch error function

Parameters:

* `function_name` - the function name to define
* `proposed_function` - the proposed function to define

objects.name: define_catch_error_function
objects.doc:
Define a catch error function

Parameters:

* `params` - the function parameters used
* `function_name` - the function name to define
* `proposed_function` - the proposed function to define

objects.name: define_function
objects.doc:
Define the function to call

Parameters:

* `params` - the function parameters used
* `function` - the function name to define
* `request` - `EXRequester.request` to use

objects.name: define_function
objects.doc:
Define the function to call

Parameters:

* `defintion_result` - the function definition result
* `params` - the function parameters used
* `function` - the function name to define
* `proposed` - the proposesd function definition to use
* `request` - `EXRequester.request` to use

objects.name: defreq
objects.doc:
Define a request function

Parameters:

* `head` - the function header AST

## Example

objects.name: exception_to_raise
objects.doc:
Exception to raise if the function was called incorrectly

Parameters:

* `called_function` - the function called
* `correct_function` - the correct function to call

objects.name: get_request_headers
objects.doc: Read the module attribute that defines the headers

objects.name: get_request_path_and_method
objects.doc: Read the module attribute that define the request HTTP method and path defined

objects.name: get_request_query
objects.doc: Read the module attribute that the query keys

objects.name: possible_attributes
objects.doc: Return all the possible attributes to define in the method

objects.name: log_request
objects.doc: Log an `EXRequester.Request` with the sent params

objects.name: log_response
objects.doc: Log an `EXRequester.Response`

objects.name: add_base_url
objects.doc:
Adds a base url to the request

Parameters:

* `request` - request to update
* `base_url` - base url to add

objects.name: add_body
objects.doc:
Adds body to the request

Parameters:

* `request` - request to update
* `body` - body to add

objects.name: add_headers_keys
objects.doc:
Adds headers key to the request

Parameters:

* `request` - request to update
* `headers_keys` - header keys to format

objects.name: add_query_keys
objects.doc:
Adds query keys to the request

Parameters:

* `request` - request to update
* `query_keys` - query keys to add

objects.name: new
objects.doc:
Return a new request

Parameters:

* `method` - The http method
* `path` - The path to request

objects.name: prepared_headers
objects.doc:
Return prepared header keyword list

Parameters:

* `request` - the request
* `header_params` - the header parametrs to update with the keys

objects.name: prepared_query
objects.doc:
Return a prepared query string

Parameters:

* `request` - the request
* `params` - the parameters to use to create the query string

objects.name: prepared_url
objects.doc:
Return a prepared url

Parameters:

* `request` - the request
* `params` - the url to fill in the format url

objects.name: parse
objects.doc:
Return a parsed `EXRequester.Response`

Parameters:

* `response` - `HTTPotion.Response` response
